bug.author: CESARDELATORRE
bug.summary: Need to add description for each transformer in this page.
bug.description:
There's no a single explanation/description in this page. Each transformer should have a short description saying what it does. i.e. "What MaxAbsScaler does". This other page has the same issue: <denchmark-link:https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/python/api/azureml-automl-core/azureml.automl.core.constants.supportedtransformersfactorynames.generic?view=azure-ml-py#maxabsscaler>https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/python/api/azureml-automl-core/azureml.automl.core.constants.supportedtransformersfactorynames.generic?view=azure-ml-py#maxabsscaler</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-h:hr></denchmark-h>

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/CESARDELATORRE>@CESARDELATORRE</denchmark-link> Thanks for the feedback. duplicate of <denchmark-link:https://github.com/Azure/MachineLearningNotebooks/issues/913>#913</denchmark-link> . We will now proceed to close this thread. If there are further questions regarding this matter, please tag me in your reply. We will gladly continue the discussion and we will reopen the issue.
